# Draft:Battle of Pishin

----
1725
| map_type          = Pakistan
| coordinates       =
| result            = *Hotak Victory
| combatant1        =  Khanate of Kalat
| combatant2        =  Hotak Dyansty
| commander1        =  Mir Abdullah Khan AhmadzaiMir Feroz Raisani
| commander2        = Shah Hussain Hotak
}}
The Battle of Pishin (Pashto: د پشین جګړه) took place between Hotak Dyansty and Khanate of Kalat for control of Pishin.
